data.title: Convert United States Dollars (USD) and Yemeni Rials (YER): Currency Exchange Rate Conversion Calculator
data.meta_description: Calculator to convert money in United States Dollar (USD) to and from Yemeni Rial (YER) using up to date exchange rates.
data.text:
This United States Dollar and Yemeni Rial convertor is up to date with exchange rates from August 17, 2024.

Enter the amount to be converted in the box to the left of United States Dollar. Use "Swap currencies" to make Yemeni Rial the default currency. Click on Yemeni Rials or United States Dollars to convert between that currency and all other currencies.

The United States Dollar is the currency in American Samoa (AS, ASM), British Virgin Islands (VG, VGB, BVI), El Salvador (SV, SLV), Guam (GU, GUM), Marshall Islands (MH, MHL), Micronesia (Federated States of Micronesia, FM, FSM), Northern Mariana Islands (MP, MNP), Palau (PW, PLW), Puerto Rico (PR, PRI), United States (United States of America, US, USA), Turks and Caicos Islands (TC, TCA), Virgin Islands (VI, VIR), Timor-Leste, Ecuador (EC, ECU), Johnston Island, Midway Islands, and Wake Island. The Yemeni Rial is the currency in Yemen (YE, YEM). The United States Dollar is also known as the American Dollar, and the US Dollar. The symbol for USD can be written $. The symbol for YER can be written YRls. The United States Dollar is divided into 100 cents. The Yemeni Rial is divided into 100 fils. The exchange rate for the United States Dollar was last updated on August 15, 2024 from The International Monetary Fund. The exchange rate for the Yemeni Rial was last updated on June 5, 2023 from MSN. The USD conversion factor has 6 significant digits. The YER conversion factor has 5 significant digits.
